actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the complexity of Federal income tax forms.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) the Internal Revenue Service should simplify Federal income tax forms to make them easily understandable; (2) State and local Governments which impose an income tax should model their tax forms on the simplified Federal forms; and (3) Congress should revise the language of the Internal Revenue Code to make it easily understandable to the average citizen.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the complexity of Federal income tax forms.
